item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 26, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI adds MCP support to Agents SDK (340 points | 100 comments)
2. Debian bookworm live images now reproducible (378 points | 86 comments)
3. A love letter to the CSV format (264 points | 259 comments)
4. Botswana Successfully Launches First Satellite, Botsat-1 (157 points | 61 comments)
5. Good-bye core types; Hello Go as we know and love it (184 points | 90 comments)
6. Building a Linux Container Runtime from Scratch (25 points | 2 comments)
7. Problems with the heap (65 points | 16 comments)
8. Building a Firecracker-Powered Course Platform to Learn Docker and Kubernetes (31 points | 1 comment)
9. MCP server for Ghidra (171 points | 22 comments)
10. Oracle customers confirm data stolen in alleged cloud breach is valid (118 points | 28 comments)
11. Writing a tiny undo/redo stack in JavaScript (29 points | 11 comments)
12. Malware found on NPM infecting local package with reverse shell (154 points | 91 comments)
13. Gemma3 Function Calling (86 points | 13 comments)
14. Writing Programs with Ncurses (42 points | 11 comments)
15. NotaGen: Symbolic Music Generation (17 points | 1 comment)
16. Don't Buy into Apple's Hype About AirPods Max Gaining Lossless Audio (33 points | 26 comments)
17. Sharding Pgvector (52 points | 7 comments)

19. Weave (YC W25) is hiring a founding product engineer ( | hide)
20. Playwright Tools for MCP (101 points | 21 comments)
21. A glitch in an online survey replaced the word 'yes' with 'forks' (114 points | 53 comments)
22. 'Naive' science fan faces jail for plutonium import (111 points | 64 comments)
23. Heap-overflowing Llama.cpp to RCE (221 points | 48 comments)
24. Has the decline of knowledge work begun? (96 points | 115 comments)
25. Kilo Code: Speedrunning open source coding AI (63 points | 41 comments)
26. Google makes Android development private, will continue open source releases (99 points | 39 comments)
27. The long-awaited Friend Compound laws in California (60 points | 113 comments)
28. Collapse OS (112 points | 105 comments)
29. Google will develop Android OS behind closed doors starting next week (218 points | 147 comments)
30. An Interview with Zen Chief Architect Mike Clark (115 points | 8 comments)
